uno.output: You are using uno version %{v}! Use `uno help` for help!

help.output:
Uno module help: 
-`uno` » See information about this module 
-`uno help` » See this help site 
-`uno category <Category>` » Set matchmaking category 
-`uno category` » Get matchmaking category

get.no: You haven't got a matchmaking channel!

set.usage: Usage: `uno setcategory <Category>` to set the category for the matchmaking and `uno setcategory [<Category>]` to remove the category!
set.output: Successfully set the matchmaking channel to %{c}(%{i})!
set.notexist: Category `%{c}` does not exist or is a channel!

category.nopermission: You do not have permission to use this command!

commands.notexist: Sub command not exist! Use `uno help` for help!
commands.nopermission: You do not have permission to use this command!

hub.name: uno-matchmaking
hub.topic: Here you can join/create (private) uno matches!

lobby.name: uno-lobby
lobby.topic: Here you can wait until the round starts! The bot send you a message with the cooldown when the round starts! You can invite people with the command `uno invite <User>`! After a cooldown, the game starts!

messages.hub: React with :arrow_forward: to join in an open lobby! Use :heavy_plus_sign: to create a new lobby! Press :lock: to create a private lobby!
messages.lobby:
Welcome to the uno lobby! To invite someone, give him the token from the command `uno tokens`! You create a token with the command `uno generate`! Then, please wait until the round starts! 
React with :heavy_multiplication_x: to leave the lobby!
messages.ingame-countdown: The game will start in %{s} seconds!
messages.lobby-countdown: The game will restart in %{s} seconds!
messages.close: The game will close in %{s} seconds if the player count is under 2!

help:
Help for module main: 
-`uno` » Get information about this module 
-`uno help` » Get the admin commands of the module 
-`uno category` » Get the category of the module 

*-* Help for the uno module *-*
